Tolkien-related events that took place in 1942.

content.title: March
content.content:
6 - Christina Scull is born.
15 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to John Kettle.

? - A Philological Miscellany Presented to Eilert Ekwall, containing an introductory note co-signed by J.R.R. Tolkien, is published.
? - Author Stanley P. Baldwin is born.

content.title: Note
content.content: While writing The Lord of the Rings, Tolkien modelled the lunar phases of T.A. 3019 on those of this year, with an offset of +5/6 days.[1]
